english: You are the representative of our tribe. The
seal of the principality as well.
The honor of the tribe is entrusted to you. Do
n't worry, sir. It will never stay as long as

Islamic world is in pieces. The

Sir, you were right. Titus is here.

text: Şövalyeleriyle birlikte kervansarayın yakınına kadar gelmişler.

Lord. Thank you for giving me a heart that can pause and listen to the

the tradition of our ancestor Oghuz…
…and the Seljuk state, which upholds this tradition .
I bear witness that there is no god but Allah.

creates with a single command… who
fills our hearts with faith. In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the
…the elders of my tribe, welcome. Welcome!

text: Beyimiz Süleyman Şah’ımız ölmeden önce vekâletini bana vermişti.
english: Our lord Suleyman Shah had given me his authority before he passed away.

text: Şimdi Süleyman Şah'sız obamızın geleceğini belirleyeceğiz.

our last consultation with the Oghuz chieftains… …
it was mentioned that the Mongols were harassing Anatolia.

… if we are not strong… if we sow
the seeds of discord among us …

We knew neither a stop nor a resting place.

text: Ne bir yaylakta, ne bir kışlakta gün yüzü görmedik.

nomad's weariness begins when he finally settles down.

text: Bahar gelip düşülecek yolun tasasını büyütür içinde.

nor does the worry of migration darken my heart. Just

we were going to name them Gündüz, Savcı, and Osman.

inner Halime. My one and only

text: Hâlâ vazgeçmedin değil mi bu sevdadan Gökçe?
english: still haven't given up on this love, have you, Gökçe? You

text: Sadece göz boyayıp dilini bağladın, değil mi?
english: just put on a show and silenced them, didn't you?
I've had my eyes blindfolded and my
tongue swallowed for a long time now.

text: Esas sen şimdi ne hal eyleyeceksin?
english: So what are you going to do now?
They said you were a tough nut to crack.
You fell into our hands too quickly. Stay
Don't let the food get stuck in your throat.
I have eaten countless morsels like you... ...while
Samarkand and Bukhara were being burned.
You're not even worth a fishbone.

text: Bir Türk son nefesini vermeden son söz söylenmemiştir.
english: A Turk's last words are not spoken until their last breath is taken. Before
the angel of death comes to take my soul...
I will not beg for mercy from you.
Who is Noyan? The one who
wants you to live. Come on
(Innkeeper) We have boiled meat and bread, sir.

text: (Erkek) Zahterle kekik de koydun mu içine?
english: (Man) Did you add thyme and oregano to it too?
(Innkeeper) Of course I'll let you in, sir?
(Innkeeper) Oh... You certainly know how to enjoy life.
(Male) After spending years traveling the roads...

text: (Hancı) Ee beyim, nedir sizi böyle yollara koyan?
english: (Innkeeper) Well sir, what has brought you to such a journey?
What would you like to own? To

text: Harzemşahlar yenilince topraklarımıza Moğol öncü birlikleri girmiş derler.
english: the Khwarazmian dynasty was defeated, Mongol vanguard troops entered our lands. They were

text: Başlarında da Noyan denilen bir cellat varmış.
english: led by an executioner named Noyan.

text: O soysuz köpekler bunca yıldır er görmediler.
english: Those vile dogs haven't seen a real man in all these years.
They became cruel because they didn't see.

text: Sultan Alaeddin onlara cenk etmesini belletecektir evelallah.
english: Sultan Alaeddin will teach them how to fight, God willing.

text: Noyan denilen celladın zalimliği dilden dile dolaşır.
english: The cruelty of the executioner named Noyan was talked about far and wide.

text: Sütü bozuk, Horasan ellerindeki kardeşlerimizi, Semerkant'ımızı...
english: His milk was spoiled; he destroyed our brothers in the lands of Khorasan , our Samarkand...

text: Bir gün cenk edip intikamımızı alacağız elbet.
english: One day we will fight and take our revenge, surely.

text: Onu gördüğün vakit ne yapmak istersin?
english: What do you want to do when you see him/her? I'd like to chop off

text: Bu elimdeki bıçakla kellesini koparmak isterdim.

english: (Sound of a knife) What you're saying will

text: Bu dediğin mutlaka bir gün olacaktır.

english: Hopefully it will happen soon. Do
you want it to happen soon?

text: En kısa vakitte o soysuzu gebertmek isterim.
english: I want to kill that scumbag as soon as possible. Are
He... He... He... He... He... He... He le le leh

text: He le le leh... He le le lel leh...
english: ... He le le lel leh... He le le leh...
He le le leh... Lah... Lah

text: Ama bunun içinde başka bir şey daha var.
english: But there's something else involved here.

text: Geceleri yalnız uyumayı hiç sevmem hancı.
english: I hate sleeping alone at night, innkeeper. You

text: O zaman hoş bir kadın bulabilirsin ha?
english: you can find an attractive woman then, huh?
For example, do you have a daughter? I do
n't have a daughter. No, my daughter.
This is very bad, old man.
(Woman) Father! No! No! You'll have to cover for

text: Birkaç gün beni idare edeceksin. Misafir Ertuğrul'u burada bekleyeceğim.
english: me for a few days. I will wait for my guest, Ertuğrul, here.

text: Bu Türkler, dost kim düşman kim bilmiyorlar asker.
english: These Turks, soldiers, don't know who is friend and who is foe.

text: Cesetleri avluya çıkartın. Kervansarayın kapılarını kapatın.
english: Take the bodies out into the courtyard. Close the caravanserai gates.
I'll wait for Tangut here. Post
Prepare this as well. Yes sir, please
Kayı tribe will also see your courage.

text: Gözünü kırpmadan, Ertuğrul'u bulmak için onca tehlikeye atılacaksın.
english: You will face all those dangers without blinking an eye to find Ertuğrul. It is

text: Başı darda olan herkese yardım etmek boynumuzun borcudur.
english: our duty to help everyone in need. Like that

text: Öyle. Lakin başı dertte olan Ertuğrul ise...
english: . But when Ertuğrul is in trouble...

text: ...o vakit yardım severliğin daha da kıymete biner.
english: ...that's when helpfulness becomes even more valuable.
Look, Ertuğrul's fame spread from Genghis Khan's court... ...to

text: Sen de en az onun kadar cesur, hatta ondan daha zekisin.
english: You are just as brave as him, perhaps even smarter.
Why do you say these things to me?

text: Çünkü analar, evlatları şan kazanıp bey olsun isterler evlat.
english: Because mothers want their sons to gain fame and become noblemen.
I would love to come with you, brother. Don't

text: Sen bacımı yalnız koyma. Biz gereğini yaparız kardeşim.
english: leave my sister alone. We'll do what's necessary, brother. Have a
n't come back until you've found our dear Doğan.

text: Ertuğrul'la Halime Sultan'ın saldırıya uğradığı yer burası.
english: Ertuğrul and Halime Sultan were attacked.
We will set off from three different directions.

text: Ortada biz, Gündoğdu'yla. Sağ ve sol kolda da atlı birlikler bizi takip edecek.
english: Here we are, with Gündoğdu. Cavalry units will follow us on both the right and left flanks. They will

text: Herhangi bir saldırı anında bize destek olup güvenliğimizi alacaklar.
english: support us and ensure our safety in the event of any attack.
Which scouts did you take with you?

text: (Tuğtekin) En iyilerini baba. Samsa ve Boğaca.
english: (Tugtekin) The best of them, Dad. Samsa and Bogach.

text: Ben de en iyi Alplerimi yanıma aldım dayı. Merak etmeyesin.
english: brought my best Alpine warriors with me, uncle. Do n't worry.
Noyan arrived from Tabriz with a vanguard of troops.

text: Amacı bilgi toplayıp, esas saldırı için hazırlık yapmakmış.
english: His aim was to gather information and prepare for the main attack.
You must be very careful. May

text: Allah yardımcınız olsun. Gazanız mübarek olsun.
english: God help you. May your campaign be blessed.
The effort is yours, the victory is God's.
Why were you so late? I'm
Who is this guy? He is one
of Ertuğrul's Alps. I am putting all my brave men in danger

text: Beyini bulmak için bunca yiğidimi tehlikeye atıyorum.
Yolda hiçbir hatayı affetmem, ona göre.
english: I won't forgive any mistakes on the road, so be warned. Don't worry,

text: Merak etme beyim. Vazifemiz neyse yaparız.
english: sir. We will do whatever our duty requires.

text: Bizim ona itimadımız tamdır. Sen de güvenebilirsin.
english: We have complete trust in him. You can trust me too. Since you're the guarantor,
I'm so sorry about what happened, Selcan.
I heard he lost all three of his children. Her
frail body couldn't carry her babies.

text: Bir kadının huzuru da mutluluğu da...
english: A woman's peace and happiness lie in...
...her husband adding to her lineage and stature.
Seeing you like this makes me sad. It is Allah who

text: Veren de alan da Allah'tır, Aytolun.
english: gives and Allah who takes, Aytolun.

text: O vakit başkaları için hiç telaş etmeyesin.
english: don't need to worry about others at all.

text: Hem bak, ben seni pek bir iyi gördüm.
english: Look, I'm glad to see you.

text: Gidenin yerine kurulmayı bek iyi becermişsin.
english: You've done a pretty good job of taking the place of the one who left.
They said she became an angel for you.

text: Lakin sende bu dil oldukça, şeytan senin sırtından inmez Selcan.
english: But as long as you have that tongue, the devil will never leave your back, Selcan.

text: Lakin şunu da bilesin, senin şeytanların burada cirit atamaz.
english: But you should know this: your devils cannot roam freely here.

text: (Ertuğrul iç ses) Geceyi gün eyleyen, günü gece eyleyen...
english: (Ertuğrul's inner voice) My Lord, who turns night into day and day into night
... who turns the heavens and rules over time... please take me out of

text: ...düştüğüm bu zilletten bir an evvel beni çıkar.
english: this humiliation I have fallen into as soon as possible .

text: (Ertuğrul iç ses) Beni düşmana rüsva eyleyecek çaresizlikte bırakma.
english: (Ertuğrul's inner voice) Don't leave me in such a state of helplessness that I will be disgraced before the enemy.

text: (Ertuğrul iç ses) Bana zalime boyun eğdirme.
english: (Ertuğrul's inner voice) Don't make me bow down to the tyrant.

text: (Ertuğrul iç ses) Yolumu bekleyen eşimi, anamı, obamı...
english: (Ertuğrul's inner voice) Oh God, don't let my wife, my mother, my tribe
... and my Alps, who are waiting for me, grieve because of me .

text: (Ertuğrul iç ses) Etlerimi lime lime doğrasalar da...
english: (Ertuğrul's inner voice) Even if they tear my flesh to shreds...
...give me the strength to endure, Lord.
(Hayme) It didn't work. I couldn't do it.
I couldn't protect my tribe. Don't say that,

text: Böyle deme Hayme. Bu çakalların karşısında dimdik durdunuz.
english: Hayme. You stood firm against these jackals. If

text: Onlar sizden bir can aldıysa siz üç can aldınız.
english: they took one life from you, you took three.

text: Öldürdüklerinin çoğu da kadın ve çocuklarmış.
english: Most of those they killed were women and children.

text: Aslanlar gibi mücadele ettiniz. Bunun hesabını er geç verecekler.
english: You fought like lions. They will pay the price for this sooner or later. They burned and
neither our belongings nor our tents left.
(Hayma) They plundered everything we owned. As
winter approached, we were left helpless and exposed to the elements.
What am I here for, Hayme?
Aytolun, Tuğtekin, what are they waiting for?

text: (Korkut) Burası bir zamanlar senin de obandı.
english: (Korkut) This was once your encampment too.

text: Şimdi doğup büyüdüğün, gelin olduğun obana geri döndün.
english: Now you have returned to the village where you were born and raised, where you became a bride. Thank you. Thanks a lot,
I will never forget this kindness.

text: Aytolun, sana ve kızlara çadır hazırlattı.
english: Aytolun had a tent prepared for you and the girls.
We will take care of the wounded and the homeless.
(Korkut) Aytolun will personally handle this matter. Thank you

text: Hayme Ana'yı çadırına götürün. Ben de birazdan geleceğim.
english: Take Hayme Ana to her tent. I'll be there shortly.

text: Hayme bacı, inşallah her şey yakında düzelecek.
english: Sister Hayme, God willing, everything will be alright soon. Tugtekin will

text: Ertuğrul'u da sağ salim bulup getirecek Tuğtekin.
english: also find Ertugrul and bring him back safe and sound . Thank

text: Her şey tez vakitte oldu bitti.
english: Everything happened and ended very quickly.
What would you like to say, Hatun? The

text: Kurmak istediğin beylik. Kayılarla bir olup kuracağın beylik.
english: principality you want to establish. The principality you will establish by uniting with the Kayı tribe. They
all appeared before him at once. Are these the things to

text: Bu acılı günde konuşulacak mesele mi bunlar Aytolun?
english: talk about on this day of sorrow, Aytolun?
On the contrary, it's exactly the right time, sir. If the

text: Bu acı günde gereken tedbirler alınmazsa...
english: necessary precautions are not taken on this sorrowful day...
...your end will be worse than that of the Kayı tribe , don't you know?
When I first held her in my arms...
...it was as if they had given me the world.

text: Hangi mülk, hangi makam bu kadar güzel olabilirdi?
english: What property, what position could be so beautiful? She was the spitting image
When his mother died, he drew strength from her beautiful eyes, her
sweet words, and her brave heart.

text: Hadi be kızım, hadi aç gözlerini.
english: Come on girl, open your eyes. Open the door
...may my weapon enter the sky and come out red,
Sir, I've used up all the medicine we have.

text: Lakin yaralıların durumu ciddi. Çoğu yarını bile görmez.
english: But the condition of the injured is serious. Most of them won't even see tomorrow. What happened to

text: Bugün onların başına gelen, yarın bizim başımıza da gelecektir.
english: them today could happen to us tomorrow.
I will send a message to Sultan Alaeddin.

text: Celalettin Harzemşah yenildikten sonra Moğolların önünde engel kalmadı.
english: After Jalal al-Din Khwarazmshah was defeated, there was no longer any obstacle in the way of the Mongols.
We need to get help from Konya.

text: Yoksa bu eşkıyaların önünde biz set olamayız.
english: Otherwise, we won't be able to stand as a barrier in front of these bandits.

text: Beyim, Kayılar bir müddet bizimle kalsın.
english: My lord, let the Kayi tribe stay with us for a while.
We strengthen our power with them. We can gather the

text: Savaşta dağılan koyun sürüsünü toplayıp daha ucuza satabiliriz.
english: sheep flocks scattered by the war and sell them for less.

text: Bu da erzak almamızı sağlar. Önümüz çetin kış.
english: This allows us to get supplies. A harsh winter lies ahead. The

text: Hayatta kalan erkekleri de işlerimizi görür.
english: surviving men can also serve our purposes.
Honestly, Artuk... I don't know how we'll overcome the

text: ...önümüze çıkacak meselelerin altından nasıl kalkacağız onu bilemem.
english: challenges that will come our way .

text: İnşallah tüm ahali onlara kucak açacaktır.
english: Hopefully, the entire community will welcome them with open arms.

text: Vakti zamanında Hazreti Peygamberimizin sahabeleri olan...
english: In the past, the Muhajir and Ansar, the companions of our Prophet,
embraced each other in the same way;
we too will be brothers and sisters.
My brother is alive. My Ertuğrul is alive.

text: Onu takip edelim diye iz bırakmış.
english: He left a trail so we could follow him. Let

text: Fazla uzağa gidemezler. Onu yürüyerek götürüyorlar. Hadi.
english: They can't go very far. They're taking him there on foot. Come on.

text: İyi ki Dündar'la Yiğit'i alp eğitimi almak için uzaklara gönderdik.
english: good thing we sent Dündar and Yiğit far away to receive alpine training.

text: En azından onlar için tasalanmayız ana.
english: At least we don't have to worry about them, Mom. You wouldn't believe how proud I am to have

text: Sizin gibi gelinlerim olduğu için ne kadar gururluyum bilseniz.

english: Hopefully they will find Ertuğrul and bring him back.
But we won't fall behind in our work either.
We won't leave you alone, Mom.
I know, my daughter. Let's wait until

text: Şu toy hele bir toplansın, ondan sonra ne yapacağımıza karar vereceğiz.
english: this assembly gets together, then we'll decide what to do. The
(Hayme) tribe gathers further down the valley. We will not
bury ourselves in our grief and leave them headless. Don't
(Halime) I was going to tell you today...
(Hayme) What were you going to say?
I wanted to hear it from him. Come on,
O God, from You we come, and to You we shall return.

text: (Hayme) Bize bu kötü günlerde bir can verdin.
english: (Hayme) You gave us a life in these difficult times. Oh
God, don't leave that soul an orphan.

text: (Tuğtekin) Gözünüzü dört açın. Ertuğrul'u bulmadan obaya dönmek yok.
english: (Tugtekin) Keep your eyes wide open. We're not returning to the camp until we find Ertuğrul.

text: (Doğan) Yolunu kaybedenden alp, haddini bilmeyenden de bir halt olmaz.
english: (Dogan) A hero cannot be someone who has lost their way, and nothing good can come from someone who does n't know their limits. Don't
you know, Kocabaş? If only you had controlled your brain instead of sharpening

text: O çizme gibi dilini bileyleyeceğine beyine sahip çıksaydın.
english: your tongue like a boot . There are no

text: Bu tarafta hiç iz yok. Tepenin öbür yamacına bak. Bir işe yararsın belki.
english: traces on this side. Look across the hill . Maybe you'll be useful.

text: Aşağıda nehrin kenarında hiç iz yoktur beyim.
english: are no tracks down by the river, sir. If we wait

text: Yarına kalırsak, işimiz daha da zor olacak.
english: until tomorrow, our job will be even harder.

text: Gece olana kadar aramaya devam edelim.

english: Sir, the guest you were expecting has arrived.
(Music - Thriller) You'll have to make do

text: İyi ki Bamsı, Dündar'la Yiğit'i alplik eğitimi için Toroslar’a götürdü.
english: good thing Bamsı took Dündar and Yiğit to the Taurus Mountains for warrior training. If he were
here right now... there would be

text: Şeytan diyor ki Bamsı gibi önünü ardını düşünme...
english: The devil says, don't think about the consequences like Bamsi...
...cut off that big head of Kocabaş...
What difference would it make if he heard?

text: Bilesiniz ki artık Süleyman Şah'ın Kayıları eziktir.
english: Know that the Kayı tribe of Suleyman Shah is now defeated.
It is docking, it is shelter. From now on,

text: Ettiğimiz her lafı ölçüp biçerek edeceğiz gayrı.
english: we will weigh our words carefully.

text: Alplerin çok sabırsız Gündoğdu abi. Samanlıkta iğne aradığımızı bilmezler mi?
english: Brother Gündoğdu is very impatient in the Alps. Don't they know we're searching for a needle in a haystack? They are
Ertuğrul also considered them brothers. There might
not be another Ertuğrul after this, brother. None
of you have the right to let yourselves go.
(Music - Emotional) If there's anyone who can help the

text: Obanın içine düştüğü bu durumdan kurtulması için...
...çıkar yol sağlayacak biri varsa, o da sensin abi.
Bilesin ki babam da ben de sonuna kadar yanındayız.
english: Know that both my father and I are with you all the way.
now is the time to be one and united. Everything that has happened to

text: Zaten başımıza ne geldiyse, bugüne kadar bunu beceremediğimiz için geldi.
english: us until now is because we haven't been able to manage this properly until now.
Ah, as for my brother Ertuğrul...

text: ...sen daha onu tanımazsın yeğenim. O her türlü belanın altından kalkar.
english: ...you don't know him yet, nephew. He can overcome any kind of trouble. He'll outsmart
Hopefully we'll find them safe and sound.
...let's be in the same place this winter.

text: Kenetlenelim. Suyumuz bol. Ekmeğimizi de bölüşürüz.
english: Let's unite. We have plenty of water. We even share our bread.

text: Hem Moğol'a karşı da birlikte oluruz. Kış burada sert geçer abi.
english: We will also stand together against the Mongols. Winters are harsh here, man.
(Tugtekin) When spring comes, war is at the door. We will

text: Alaeddin'in ordusuyla birlik olup Moğol'u toprağımızdan atarız.
english: unite with Alaeddin's army and drive the Mongols out of our land.
We'll see what happens later, God willing. By

text: (Doğan) Bu çakalı çalıların arasında yakaladım. Bizi dinliyordu herhalde.
english: (Dogan) I caught this jackal among the bushes . He was probably listening to us.

text: Söyle bakalım, Noyan'ın iti misin sen?
english: Tell me, are you Noyan's dog?

text: Onun adı Geyikli. Meczup, divane bir gezgindir. Zararı yoktur.
english: His name is Geyikli. He is a madman, a deranged wanderer. It has no harmful effects.

text: Ama onu bugüne kadar kimsenin yakaladığı vaki değildir.
english: But no one has ever caught him to this day.

text: (Tuğtekin) İz sürmeyi beceremesen de kulakların keskinmiş. Tebrik ederim.
english: (Tugtekin) Even though you can't track things, you have a sharp ear. Congratulations.

text: Lakin bilesin ki geyikten hızlı, tilkiden kurnaz...
english: But know this: it is faster than a deer, more cunning than a fox... and
stronger than a bear. More infections.
I was waiting for you, dear friend.
Yes. I am a demon in this hell.
My lord, smoke is rising from the caravanserai.

text: Ben size söylemiştim. Demiştim! Beni dinlemediniz işte!
english: I told you. I told you! You didn't listen to me!

text: Eğer bu Kocabaş uğursuzu yüzünden beyimin başına bir şey gelirse...
english: If anything happens to my husband because of this jinx Kocabaş... I will hold you all accountable

text: Böyle ileri geri konuşmaya devam edersen doğruca obaya dönersin, bilmiş ol.
english: talking back and forth like this, you'll end up straight back home, just so you know.
Mount your horses quickly. Come on!
Welcome to the world of the Mongols.

text: Teknik Yapım: Murat Çağlar Özçelik - Havva Faydalı
english: Technical Production: Murat Çağlar Özçelik - Havva Faydalı
